Keywords: Animal , Mystical , Ruler , Savage Land , Wakanda , Warrior
Real Name: Kevin Plunder
Special Powers
ONE WITH THE SAVAGE LAND: At the beginning of the game, generate a Zabu bystander [MAX 1]. // When Ka-Zar is give a MOVE action, after resolutions you may move another friendly character with a shared keyword or a friendly Zabu bystander up to half its speed value.
LORD OF THE SAVAGE LAND: Charge, Leap/Climb, Stealth.
A SPECIAL BOND: Leadership. When Ka-Zar uses it and succeeds, after resolutions choose one:
*Generate a Zabu bystander [MAX 1].
*Move a friendly Zabu bystander up to half its speed value.
Trade Ka-Zar Want Ka-Zar

Comments
November 30, 2022
CaptainAmerica1945
Okay, to be fair any piece that allows another to move for free is very strong. Given the keywards this guy possess I could/can see him getting banned easily perhaps not in modern but in either legacy or silver age. Mystical, Ruler and Warrior leading the charge so to speak on his keywards. With pieces like Steve Rogers giving Shield or Avengers to anyone this guy goes from great to absolute insanity; Hulk, Iron Man, Scarlet Witch being able to move for free is nuts!! Of course if you run more than one copy of Steve Rogers you can bring in other friends to the Avengers or Shield which makes this guy even more powerful- yes he is a bit squishy but the payoffs greatly out weigh the risks. Truthfully I'm not sure if he will survive in modern because of other pieces he allows to move; more specifically like Agatha and Scarlet Witch- being able to move and then theoretically put down a chaos marker is obscene. Time will tell but I get the feeling this guy is a bit too strong despite being unique and a rare.
November 8, 2022

November 8, 2022
Novashotgunner
Alyosha Kraven is that you? Reincarnated into good 'ol Ka-zar here? (pronounced Kay-Sar) Not only to we get a new Kevin Plunder but he's amazing and with a myriad of keywords to benefit from his ability. He's an A+ figure and so easy to build teams around. Silver age and wendigos like this guy a lot.
November 5, 2022
Hellboy the Bellboy
This is amazing. Then you notice he has the Mystical keyword and he upgrades to bonkers. Giving a character an extra move (at half) is always good and I love bystander generators (especially when it's not once per game). You have a bystander that has potential to deal great damage, you have a fine close combat combatant in Ka-Zar and you get extra move. What is not to love?
